title: New: M o z a i c s – Dose
body:
I can’t hear the chorus of **Mozaic’s** _Dose_ without thinking of Interpol, both from the lyrical similarity, to the vocal tone, it’s a comparison that can’t be missed.

That said, there’s definitely something in their worthy attempt at anthemic indie, albeit still feeling very much in demo form at times. Check out Dose below.

That said, there’s definitely something in their worthy attempt at anthemic indie, albeit still feeling very much in demo form at times. Check out Dose below.
